executive_summary: Target employs 12 IT staff across 4 functional teams
Synergy opportunity: License consolidation and tool rationalization
Integration complexity appears manageable given cloud-first architecture
Key person risk identified in IT leadership (F-ORG-001)
Security posture requires attention - MFA coverage below target
org_structure_narrative:
The IT organization at TechCo Solutions is structured as a lean team
with 12 total headcount. The organization appears run-heavy
based on team composition, with significant
outsourcing in service delivery functions.

Inference: The ratio of 12 IT staff to support the business suggests a lean operating model
that may face capacity constraints during integration or separation activities.

team_stories.day_to_day: The Infrastructure team handles day-to-day operations with 4 staff
constraints: Mixed staffing model may complicate transition
team_stories.mna_implication: Synergy opportunity: Consolidation with buyer team possible

team_stories.day_to_day: The Applications team handles day-to-day operations with 3 staff
team_stories.mna_implication: Synergy opportunity: Consolidation with buyer team possible

team_stories.day_to_day: The Service Desk team handles day-to-day operations with 3 staff
team_stories.mna_implication: TSA exposure: Outsourced services may require transition agreement

team_stories.day_to_day: The Security team handles day-to-day operations with 2 staff
team_stories.mna_implication: Synergy opportunity: Consolidation with buyer team possible

day_1_requirements: Ensure NetSuite access continues without interruption
Maintain network connectivity to all locations
Continue security monitoring and incident response capability
separation_considerations: Establish standalone identity management (migrate from parent AD)
Negotiate TSA for infrastructure services (6-12 month term)
Build or contract Service Desk capability
Implement standalone network egress and security

benchmark_statements: Inference: IT headcount of 12 suggests a lean operating model
Outsourcing concentration in 1 functions indicates reliance on external delivery
MFA coverage at 85% falls below enterprise security expectations
Inference: Cloud adoption level suggests modern infrastructure posture

risks_table.risk: Key person dependency on CIO/IT leadership
risks_table.why_it_matters: Single point of failure for IT strategy and operations
risks_table.likely_impact: Day-1 continuity risk if key staff depart
risks_table.mitigation: Implement knowledge transfer program and document critical processes

risks_table.why_it_matters: Incomplete security controls increase breach risk
risks_table.likely_impact: Potential compliance issues and security incidents
risks_table.mitigation: Deploy PAM solution and consolidate endpoint protection within 90 days

risks_table.why_it_matters: Heavy reliance on third parties for critical functions
risks_table.likely_impact: TSA complexity and potential service gaps during transition
risks_table.mitigation: Map all vendor dependencies and negotiate assignment/continuation terms

risks_table.why_it_matters: Aging systems require investment and pose integration challenges
risks_table.likely_impact: Higher integration costs and timeline risk
risks_table.mitigation: Prioritize modernization roadmap aligned with deal thesis

risks_table.why_it_matters: Shared systems contain commingled data requiring extraction
risks_table.likely_impact: Extended timeline and cost for clean separation
risks_table.mitigation: Engage data migration specialist and establish extraction plan

synergies_table.why_it_matters: Duplicate software licenses across buyer and target
synergies_table.first_step: Inventory all software licenses and identify overlaps within 30 days

synergies_table.why_it_matters: Redundant support organizations can be combined
synergies_table.first_step: Map service desk volumes and SLAs to plan consolidation

synergies_table.why_it_matters: Combined cloud footprint enables better pricing and architecture
synergies_table.first_step: Consolidate cloud accounts and negotiate enterprise agreement

synergies_table.why_it_matters: Multiple overlapping security tools can be standardized
synergies_table.first_step: Assess security stack overlap and select go-forward toolset
